text:
this patch adds a note stating that external pubs and modules defined by
[pubs|modules].root.dirs are copied over to build/lenya/webapp/lenya/ at
build-time rather than referenced and used in their original place.
creator: nettings@apache.org
nettings@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 17292
add two comments to build.properties

creator: nettings@apache.org
text: with modules.copy=false and <content-dir/>, this is now obsolete.
